com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine

Interface JobExecutionStateMachine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobExecutionStateMachineImpl

    public interface JobExecutionStateMachine
    Interface JobExecutionStateMachine hides the actual state machine details.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExecutionContext getExecutionContext()
      Get the execution context.
      java.util.List<ExecutionStage> getExecutionStages()
      Get the list of execution stages.
      void kill(KillService.KillSource killSource)
      Abort execution, if necessary by stopping the running job process.
      void run()
      Runs the state machine until completion.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
        Runs the state machine until completion.

      • getExecutionStages

        java.util.List<ExecutionStage> getExecutionStages()
        Get the list of execution stages.
        Returns:
        an immutable ordered list of execution stages

      • getExecutionContext

        ExecutionContext getExecutionContext()
        Get the execution context. This is meant for post-execution read-only access.
        Returns:
        the execution context used by the state machine.

      • kill

        void kill(KillService.KillSource killSource)
        Abort execution, if necessary by stopping the running job process. The state machine still runs to termination, but may skip steps as appropriate.
        Parameters:
        killSource - a representation of who/what requested the kill
